snippet: Sport Graphics, a company based in Indianapolis, produced the signs and created the vinyl adhesive building wraps that have transformed the city for the Super Bowl.
abstract: Sport Graphics, a company based in Indianapolis, produced the signs and created the vinyl adhesive building wraps that have transformed the city for the Super Bowl.

headline.seo: N.F.L. Vendor Wraps Up City Before Super Bowl Begins
headline.main: Graphics Company Has Indianapolis Under Wraps
